title: Ticket #3683: Minimize calls to DescribeInstances().
description:
We make a call to DescribeInstances() for an individual job in two cases:

In GM_PROBE_JOB, we call ec2_vm_status(), which returns slightly different information about the individual job than ec2_vm_status_all() does about all jobs. Extending the latter to make the former superfluous should be relatively straightforward.

In GM_SEEK_INSTANCE_ID, we're checking to see if a job which entered the removed state while the grid manager was down spawned an instance. (This can happen if we were interrupted between the call to RunInstances() and recording the instance ID.)
